alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Northumberland; Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 1:47PM EDT until June 26 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Columbia County in central Pennsylvania... East central Northumberland County in central Pennsylvania... North central Schuylkill County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 147 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wilburton Number Two, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mount Carmel, Shenandoah, Frackville, Kulpmont, Ashland, Girardville, Lavelle, Altamont, Englewood, Aristes, Fountain Springs and Numidia. This includes Interstate 81 from mile markers 120 to 126. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
